SEARCH

Class Asteroid

java.lang.Object
Planet
Asteroid
public class Asteroid extends Planet
The Asteroid class represents an asteroid in the solar system. It extends the Planet class and adds additional functionality for asteroids.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class Planet

    angle, color, diameter, distance, solarSystem

  • Constructor Details

    • Asteroid

      public Asteroid(double distance, double angle, double diameter, String color, SolarSystem solarSystem, int asteroidCount)
      Constructs a new Asteroid object.
      Parameters:
      distance - The distance of the asteroid from the sun.
      angle - The angle of the asteroid.
      diameter - The diameter of the asteroid.
      color - The color of the asteroid.
      solarSystem - The solar system the asteroid belongs to.
      asteroidCount - The number of asteroids.

    • asteroidLoop

      public void asteroidLoop(int asteroidCount)
      Loops through the specified number of asteroids and draws them in the solar system. Each asteroid is drawn at a random distance and angle, and with a random size.
      Parameters:
      asteroidCount - The number of asteroids to draw.
